text: Jorge Nuñez Piris (born Jue 18, 1972 in Madrid) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished first in the 4 X 100 meter T11-T13 race. He finished third in the 100 meter T12 race. == References == Category:Spanish sprinters Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Jorge Nuñez Piris
